tasks.task: Setting up and testing a solar power system
subtasks: Purchasing two 10-watt solar cells for $44 each
Verifying the performance of the solar cells by testing them in direct sunlight
Connecting a 10-ohm resistor to the solar cells to check for 10 watts output at 12 volts
Evaluating the actual power output (12 volts, 5 volts, and 200 milliamps) compared to expected 10 watts

tasks.task: Tracking power usage with a charging circuit
subtasks: Monitoring the charger circuit's measurement of power being used
Charging a USB battery using the solar setup
Noting the limited power output (167 milliamp hours) from the battery
